name: Penguin Queen
text:
1 "Penguin" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can reveal 1 "Penguin" monster in your hand; Shuffle it into the Deck, then Special Summon 1 "Penguin" monster from your Deck with the same level but a different name. If a card is returned to the hand by the effect of a "Penguin" card: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Penguin Queen" once per turn.
